name: Singapore Model AI Governance Framework
description: Voluntary principles-based framework providing guidance on responsible AI deployment, emphasizing industry self-governance with government facilitation. Focuses on human-centric AI with practical implementation guides.

costs.cost_source: PDPC Model AI Governance Framework 2nd Edition 2020

key_requirements: Operations management including risk and data management
embedding_text: Singapore Model AI Governance Framework. Voluntary principles-based framework for responsible AI. Industry self-governance. Human-centric approach. Internal governance structures. Human involvement in decision-making. Operations and risk management. Stakeholder communication. Finance, healthcare, public services, technology sectors. Practical implementation guidance. No mandatory compliance costs.
